mutants.code:
def count_punished_pairs(s: str) -> int:
    """
    Counts the number of pairs of students that will be punished after they turn around.

    Parameters:
    s (str): A string representing the activities of students before they see Chef entering the class.
             '*' denotes a student studying, '>' denotes a student talking to the right, and '<' denotes a student talking to the left.

    Returns:
    int: The number of pairs of students that will be punished.
    """
    return s.count('')
